page.title: 04LOCATION OF INDUSTRY
page.content: In{Clydebank}there are 2 business/industry locations. They are 1){Riverside}(U.I.E. Shipbuilding) 2){Business Park.} In the B.P. there are a variety of industries ranging from Y.T.S. Schemes to frozen food manufacturers. The {reasons}for moving to the B.P. were 1){The 100% 10 yr. rates relief. 2){Need for expansion. 3){The convenient position in relation {to Glasgow Airport and motorways. {U.I.E. Shipbuilding}is positioned south of the B.P. and on the banks of the{R.Clyde,}20 km. upstream of the Firth of Clyde. They are positioned on the original{John Brown Shipbuilding site (which closed in 1979). John Brown was the birthplace of famous liners ie.{QE2,}but now they build oil rigs.
